titleStmt.title: A declaration made by my lord prince of Conde, for to shew and declare the causes, that haue co[n]strained him to take vpon him the defence of the Kinges authoritie of the gouernement of the Queene, and of the quietness of this realme, with the protestation therevpon requisite
titleStmt.author: Condé, Louis, prince de, 1530-1569.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Roulande Hall, for Edwarde Sutton, dwellyng in Loumbarde streate, at the signe of the Cradell,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The protestation of the prynce of Conde.
This edition has in title 'by my lord prince'; sheet B from same setting as STC 16849--STC.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.

place.placeName: Loumbarde streate, at the signe of the Cradell
